subject: Hi dear ,
body:
Hi dear ,
Thank you for your prompt response to my email and to better explain this, I'd like to get straight to the point. I work for a company in the United Kingdom, that produces antiviral, retro-viral injections, treatments and food supplements for export as a Research Assistant.
A major component of our  production of these products is the  Nitrovicilin herbal Oil NC002 herbal oil. Now my company is in urgent need of this"Nitrovicilin herbal Oil NC002" to start production, but at this time my company does not  have any sellers available to buy it from.
But I was able to find a local distributor on my own who offers the highest quality of this product at a bargain price of $9,500 per drum compared to the price of$22,400 per drum that we used to buy from other suppliers.
I intend to project someone from a different area to my company directors as the supplier, who will be a Centerman between  the local dealer that I found and my company because  I don’t want my company to  know the original local dealer because of my private interest in the business.
I would step in to introduce you to our company as a new local dealer from your country. The reason for this is because I don't want my company to have direct contact with the local agent that sells herbal oil extract very cheap.
As a local seller, you ship to us at a cost of $22,400 or less. This will attract the attention of our managers to buy from you. For each drum of herbal oil extract purchased, we have a chance to earn a net profit of about $12,900.
We typically buy 85 to 100 barrels quarterly. So do the math yourself and see how much profit you can make from this trade every 3 months. This can be another income generating business out of your speciality as you dont need any experience in the pharmaceutical field to participate with me.
I am confident that the benefits of this business opportunity will allow us to establish ourselves as partners. I look forward to working with you.
Sincerely,
Wesley Edward

subject: Re: Hi dear ,
body:
Hi Wesley,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining this business opportunity. It sounds like an interesting venture, especially since it involves the production of antiviral treatments and food, which are very important in today's world.

I'm curious about a few things though. Could you please explain more about the herbal oil? What is it made from? And why is it so crucial to your company's products?

Also, I'm wondering how the shipping process would work. Would I be responsible for arranging the shipping or would your company handle that?

Looking forward to hearing more about this.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hi dear ,
body:
Dear Charles,

First of all I must apologize for my late response and further inform you
that the supply of this product is open to the public and my employers have
been receiving offers for the supply of mentioned herbal oil, but we
strictly deal with supply based on the purity level of the oil and so far
none of the prospective suppliers products have been approved due to poor
purity level.

I however believe we still have a chance at taking advantage of the
situation since I am 99% certain that my contacts products will match the
purity level demanded by my employee.


In response to your questions, This herbal oil is obtained from a SCARCE
organic plant that is nurtured under good environmental conditions and is
grown only in specific regions in Africa and some parts of Europe. The
herbal oil is produced when the raw form of the herb is cold-pressed and
pressurized and the resulting product is what is known as Sedogroxin HY22.

Right after the coronavirus pandemic due to reductions in demand and health
concerns my employers main and only local supplier had to permanently shut
down till date and now we have a huge order for products which this herbal
oil happens to be the main ingredients for it's production , like I
explained I took my time and made some serious search and was able to
discover a local direct farmer/supplier based in Turkey who can supply us
with this product at very subsidized rate.


The scheme of work:

This is where you come in, You will act as a front local dealer and will
supply to our company at the rate of US$21,500.00 per barrel. This price is
very considerate as it is a lot less than what we used to purchase from our
old supplier ,therefore my company purchasing officer will be more than
willing to make a quick purchase of as many drums of this herb oil as
possible  because of the pressure we are facing to get back to production
immediately.

But in all sincerity the local supplier is selling at a cheap rate of
US$8,500 per drum, which is far cheaper than our previous purchases , I
hope you now see where we shall be making our profits from ? It is a clear
case of purchasing at a low rate of $8,500.00 and selling at minus plus
$21,500.00 therefore making profits of $13,000.00 on each barrel of this
herbal oil and this is not inclusive of the freight cost from the supplier
in Turkey to my employer's warehouse in the UK.

I have done all necessary investigations into this and have also reached to
a contact who works with the supplier ,made enquiries and have even
obtained a little sample of the herbal oil which I have carried out an
analytical test on and have confirmed that it is pure and the exact
specification needed by my company,least I forget this is a very urgent and
pressing matter that can start and be concluded in less than 3 weeks time
therefore your time and attention will be needed in order to achieve this.

Shipment of the herbal oil which comes in barrels/drums will be arranged by
the supplier on our behalf under instruction directly to my company . These
barrels will carry any name we wish to instruct the supplier to mark on the
shipment document.

Note that the whole idea is to conceal the name and contacts of the
supplier so my company does not find out and start dealing with them
directly and cut us off as middlemen.

Let me know your thoughts so we can proceed further.
Best regards,
Ramona Heidi

subject: Re: Hi dear ,
body:
Hello Ramona Heidi,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's fascinating to learn about the production of Sedogroxin and its importance in your company's operations. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with this industry, but your message has certainly piqued my interest.

I understand that you're looking for a local dealer to act as a front for the supply of this herbal oil. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further:

1. Could you please elaborate on the role and responsibilities of the local dealer? What exactly would be expected of me in this position?
2. You mentioned that the supplier is based in Turkey. Do I need to travel there or can all transactions be handled remotely?
3. How is payment handled between us and the supplier? And how will profits be distributed?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hi dear ,
body:
Hello Ramona Heidi,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's fascinating to learn about the production of Sedogroxin and its importance in your company's operations. I'm also intrigued by the opportunity you've presented.

I do have a few questions, though. Could you please explain more about my role as a local dealer? What would be my responsibilities? And how would we handle the financial transactions?

Also, could you tell me more about this supplier in Turkey? How did you find them and what makes their product superior to others?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hi dear ,
body:
Dear Charles,

I have received your email and I wish to answer accordingly.

This is not a buy and sell , it is a 3 years supply process of monthly
supply when you win the contract and which will only be possible if our
product meets up with the purity level as demanded by my employer  , I am
also 99.5% certain we have this product for certain .  I will guide and
direct you with the help of my insider contact in the company's board .

 Secondly the contract process is not rigorous as I know it is not your
field , I will guide you until we achieve success . You don’t need to
travel to Turkey . Our last supplier did not travel to Turkey . I will
guide you throughout the process.The supplier will help handle production
and delivery and only put your name in paperwork so the products arrive
here in your name .

The profit we share is the net profit which is after deductions of all
expenses incurred . I only take my commission after the business .

 Once we sign the Mou I will guide and direct you accordingly, if this is
ok with you then send me your full name /company name and address so my
lawyer friend can draft a gentleman's MOU on both of our behalfs .
Best regards,
Heidi.

subject: Re: Hi dear ,
body:
Hello Charles,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's quite interesting to hear about this years supply process of monthly supply. I'm glad to know that the product's purity level is a priority for your employer.

I appreciate your assurance about guiding me through the contract process, especially since it's not my field. The fact that I don't need to travel to Turkey makes things easier.

It's good to know that the supplier will handle production and delivery, and my name will only be used in paperwork. 

The profit sharing arrangement sounds fair, with net profit being shared after all expenses are deducted.

Before we proceed further, could you please clarify a few points? What exactly is the product we're dealing with? And what does the MOU involve?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hi dear ,
body:
Dear Charles,

Sedogroxin HY22 is a rare herbal mixture which involves  a combination of
herbal scrubs and roots in local pressing and environmental conditions .
It’s a rare herbal combination under guided environments.

The MOU is our agreement that states to both of us that you will give me
the commission after you have gotten the contract and executed it . It is
an agreement that binds us . Once I receive your full name and address I
will proceed with the drafting of the MOU
Best regards,
Heidi.

subject: Re: Hi dear ,
body:
Hello Heidi,

Thank you for your message and the information about Sedogroxin. It sounds like a fascinating herbal mixture. Could you tell me more about the specific herbs used in it? And how are they processed to ensure their potency?

Regarding the MOU, I appreciate your explanation. However, could you please clarify what exactly is involved in executing the contract? 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hi dear ,
body:
Hello Heidi,

Thank you for your message. It's fascinating to hear about Sedogroxin and its unique blend of herbal scrubs and roots. I'm always interested in learning about rare herbs and their uses.

Regarding the MOU, it sounds like a significant step forward. However, could you please explain more about how this process works? What does executing the contract entail? And what kind of commitment is required from my side?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Hi dear ,
body:
Dear Charles,

Sorry for my late response , work has really been at its peak for a while
as we are into heavy demands and a lot of production is going on therefore
my attention is always needed in the factory and lab plus I am working over
time lately to earn more and meet up with some personal needs.


At this point I think I have broken down this transaction to you enough for
us to move to the business part of the deal but it seems you are not clear
about a couple of things which I will try and explain to you in the
simplest form ,also understand that I am a science guy and have very vague
idea about business though I have conceived and nursed this business idea
for a while and have processed it over time and know it is doable. I have
worked here for a while and have somehow managed to follow up on how the
company goes about its procurement of materials used in production .


The only reason why I am not following this up by myself and need a partner
is because my work contract forbids me for getting involved in any business
that has to do with supply of goods and services back to my employers ,
this is the sole reason why I have contacted you and in business there must
be trust as long as money is involved , this is why we must agree and put
pen to paper before we move into business propre and this is where the MOU
comes in , an MOU stands for Memorandum Of Understanding . This document
shows an proves that as gentlemen we have agreed to pursue this endeavor
and once our purpose is achieved we will split the profits as agreed and it
will also state that any information shared between us will be treated as
confidential and will not be divulged to a third party or used against each
other even if we eventually disagree at a point we shall part ways amicably
.


The major commitment here for you is that you will make out time to be
available to establish and exchange communication between you and my
company's chief procurement officer , you shall also be the link between
the supplier and the buyer .Once we agree I will provide you with the
contacts of the mentioned players in this transaction .Have in mind that my
company sees you as the supplier and not a middleman and on no occasion
shall we release the contacts of the supplier to them or we shall lose
relevance and the profits from the deal.


Good a thing is that my employers will be funding the procurement of the
herbal oil , they shall be giving us a 60% total cost of the goods up front
and the balance 40% as soon as shipping documents are provided to them .
All we need to do now is to convince them that we can supply and also prove
to them that the purity level of the products is at least 95% .


I have also mentioned that this might be a one time supply of a certain
quantity of the herbal oil or we might end up getting a 1-3 years supply
contract of the herbal oil and this is a big deal my friend, so if you are
to get involved with this then you must give it your time and attention as
the profits at the end of the day will be worth every bit of the stress it
might cost us.


Kindly note that this supply deal is open to the public and it's a first
come first serve basis ,therefore if eventually some other supplier happens
to provide samples of this herbal oil and it meets up the required purity
level then we have lost out on the deal. This is why we have to move fast
and this can only happen after the MOU is drawn up and we sign then we can
move into business properly .


I believe I have stated my plans clearly and it's best we proceed as
planned , kindly provide me with your credentials to enable the MOU to be
drawn up immediately .
Best regards,
Ramona Heidi

subject: Re: Hi dear ,
body:
Dear Charles,

Thank you for your patience and understanding. I'm sorry if I seem a bit slow on the uptake, but I'm just trying to make sure I understand everything correctly. 

From what I gather, you're suggesting that we enter into a business deal where we supply your company with certain materials. However, due to your work contract, you can't be directly involved in this supply chain. Is that correct?

I must admit, the idea of signing an MOU (Memorandum Of Understanding) sounds very official and important! It's something I've never done before so it's quite exciting.

You mentioned that my main role would be to establish communication between your company's chief officer and the supplier. That sounds like a big responsibility! But don't worry, I'm up for the challenge.

It's also great to hear that your company will be funding the purchase of the herbal oil upfront. That certainly takes some pressure off!

However, there are a few things that are still unclear to me. For instance, how do we ensure the purity level of the products? And what happens if another supplier beats us to it?

I hope you don't mind all these questions. As you know, I'm not much of a business person so all this is new to me.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Charles
